title: Pete Buttigieg Is Trying to Fix Air Travel With a ‘Dashboard.’ What’s on It?
description: The D.O.T. says its new interactive chart is compelling many U.S. airlines to publicly commit to pay for things like hotels and meals when flights are canceled or significantly delayed. But does it have teeth?
dc:creator: Heather Murphy and Niraj Chokshi
media:credit: Paul Hennessy/SOPA Images — LightRocket, via Getty Images
media:description: Travelers look at a display board showing canceled and delayed flights at Orlando International Airport earlier this year.
